Title: Establishes a training wage equal to eighty-five percent of the state minimum wage or one hundred percent of the federal minimum wage
Summary: Establishes a training wage equal to eighty-five percent of the state minimum wage or one hundred percent of the federal minimum wage, whichever is greater, that may be paid to a youth who has no prior job experience; provides that no youth may be paid a training wage for more than one hundred eighty days.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing a training wage
